definitions.definition: An officer on board a merchant ship who is in charge of the cargo and its sale ; also, if there are two of such officers, the senior one, the other being the subcargo .
An agent or representative of a company in charge of its overseas business .

main_definition: ( historical ) An officer on board a merchant ship who is in charge of the cargo and its sale ; also, if there are two of such officers, the senior one, the other being the subcargo .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) An agent or representative of a company in charge of its overseas business .
